We're currently focusing on a pilot with [image analysis consultation](consultation_images.qmd), but we're eager to take on other challenges as well!

Send us an e-mail ([info@biodsc.nl](mailto:info@biodsc.nl)) including:

-	A short summary of the broader project and research question (±1-3 sentences)
-	A brief description of what you aim to achieve with your analysis approach (±1-5 sentences)
-	Example data (required if you have data, otherwise describe what you’ll do)
-	If applicable, your current analysis approach
